title: Oracle's Code Assist: Fashionably Late to the GenAI Party
author: Darryl K Taft
description: Oracle has a new GenAI tool brewing internally that will hit the market in the future to tap a sweet spot for Java and SQL developers, among others.
cntitle: Oracle 的代码助手：时尚地迟到 GenAI 派对
cndescription: Oracle 内部正在酝酿一款新的 GenAI 工具，未来将投放市场，以满足 Java 和 SQL 开发人员等开发人员的特定需求。
